shortDescription: Enterprise Header System Unification & Component Refactoring
problem: Header components were scattered across different sections (Buildings, Contacts, Projects, Units) without consistent patterns, making maintenance difficult and UI inconsistent
cause: Legacy approach where each section implemented its own header component without following enterprise design patterns

solution.phase1: Created centralized SectionHeader component in enterprise-system with consistent props and styling
solution.phase2: Updated all section headers (Buildings, Contacts, Projects, Units) to use the new centralized component
solution.phase3: Refactored HeaderTitle component to support new enterprise patterns
solution.phase4: Updated exports and types to maintain clean architecture
solution.phase5: Ensured backward compatibility while providing consistent UI across all sections

testing: Manual verification of header consistency across all sections, TypeScript compilation check
notes: All headers now follow enterprise design patterns with consistent styling
SectionHeader component provides reusable pattern for future sections
Maintained TypeScript safety and clean architecture principles
Reduced code duplication across header components
